summary: For more than 5 years I develop software with an urge to help people solve their problems. I develop product rather than close issues. Proactivity, empathy, focusing on the product result, end-user experience, and runtime stability these are the qualities I value most both in colleagues and myself. Do we match?

experience.title: Senior backend dev
experience.description: Senior backend developer in the medical insurance sphere. Python/Django/PyTest, Docker; Implemented multiple features in a large Django Admin with some JavaScript; solved a problem by a paid service rather than a month of coding from scratch.

experience.title: Tech lead and backend dev
experience.description: Tech lead and backend developer designing and building a new buildings storefront. Python/asyncio/FastAPI/PyTest, Docker, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch; Improved stability, performance, test coverage and architecture of several micro-services. Introduced SRE practices (monitorings, safe migrations) and processes; improved work processes; collaborated closely with the product manager to design principal implementations and fit features to sprints.

experience.title: Backend developer
experience.description: Backend development in the intranet department. Python/Django/Celery/PyTest, Docker, PostgreSQL/YQL; Worked on 10+ projects, mainly an internal hiring system; Increased employee hiring rate and decreased leaving rate by developing reference giving system and employee rotation system; Launched a negotiation service with a state machine for creating a new negotiation; Led migration to a new PaaS. Mentored in Yandex Backend Development school.

education.school: Moscow State University, Department of Computational Mathematics and Cybernetics
